name: Goblins and Ogres - Oh My!
description:
"Save us dear Sir Knight from those terrible beasts"

"At once my lady!"

Goblins and Ogres - Oh My is a tactical skirmish game for PC.  Fight skirmishes against the PC or against your friends on the same desktop.

Includes 6 playable races.

Comes with C#/SDL2 source code as well.

Graphical and other assets acquired from a variety of sources over time.
